channel.title: Files not saving on disconection?!
channel.description:
okay well on my server, players crash randomly, my guess its either cuz of the client, or something up with the server....
heres wat the disconections look like tho...
[code]Accepting HIDDEN IP: 1500. UserId: 6009961 Strpurdu logged on. Could not save for Dakilla756 Playr Dakilla756 Logged out. Could not save for Strpurdu Playr Strpurdu Logged out. Accepting HIDDEN IP: 1503. UserId: 6009961 Strpurdu logged on. Could not save for Ploopy Playr Ploopy Logged out. Could not save for Thiagoo01 Playr Thiagoo01 Logged out. Accepting HIDDEN IP: 37870. UserId: 80193998 Iamdum logged on. Iamdum: INFO NOT FOUND- making new. -Bruno str10- Fatal: couldn't find connection vertex! Dropping packet. Could not save for Bruno str10 Playr Bruno str10 Logged out. Could not save for Piefromhell Playr Piefromhell Logged out. Accepting HIDDEN IP: 1955. UserId: 33828431 Bruno str10 logged on. Accepting HIDDEN IP: 2863. UserId: 42142520 Piefromhell logged on. -I pkphat i- Fatal: couldn't find connection vertex! Dropping packet. Accepting HIDDEN IP: 3649. Could not save for I pkphat i Playr I pkphat i Logged out. UserId: 5255528 Ploopy logged on. Accepting HIDDEN IP: 6303. UserId: 43431973 I pkphat i logged on. Could not save for Morphskilla Playr Morphskilla Logged out. Accepting HIDDEN IP: 4425. UserId: 45513238 Morphskilla logged on. -Cooloo- Fatal: couldn't find connection vertex! Dropping packet. Could not save for Cooloo Playr Cooloo Logged out. Rejected HIDDEN IP:6305 Could not save for Iamdum Playr Iamdum Logged out. Accepting HIDDEN IP: 61771. UserId: 71236785 Cooloo logged on. Could not save for I pkphat i Playr I pkphat i Logged out. Could not save for Cooloo Playr Cooloo Logged out. Accepting HIDDEN IP: 50549. I pot u drop: INFO NOT FOUND- making new. Could not save for Dragon355 Playr Dragon355 Logged out. Could not save for Jon Playr Jon Logged out. K0 y0u: INFO NOT FOUND- making new. -Jahrrel- Invalid waypoint in walking queue! -Piefromhell- Fatal: couldn't find connection vertex! Dropping packet. Could not save for Piefromhell Playr Piefromhell Logged out. Accepting HIDDEN IP: 2876. UserId: 42142520 Piefromhell logged on. [/code]
TOOK A LONG TIME TO REMOVE ALL THE PLAYERS IP'S AND COMMANDS/ACTION BUTTON LINES FROM THAT, SO PLEEZE HELP
notice this part... [code]Could not save for Piefromhell Playr Piefromhell Logged out.[/code]

item.title: Files not saving on disconection?!
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
